headline: Maduro Seizes Control of the Legislature, a Venezuelan Holdout
abstract: It was the last political institution in opposition hands. Now President Nicolás Maduro’s has moved closer to total control of the state.
lead_paragraph: CARACAS — Venezuela’s authoritarian leader, Nicolás Maduro, moved on Sunday to consolidate his grip on power by taking control of the country’s last independent institution and sidelining the lawmaker who had staked a rival claim to the presidency.
